name: OFC It's A Demon
description:
STORY: Here is a game about a dashing handsome knight, coming to a random town for directions to the best pub. But to his disbelief, the town was actually full of ghosts, ghosts of people who sacrificed themselves to the town’s demon. Well, I guess he has to run before the demon and ghosts get to him.

SUMMARY: This game is an endless runner made for class. It meets all the requirements and exceeds them too with different systems, animations, and more.

MUSIC: Monolith Official Soundtrack by ArcOfDream 

https://arcofdream.itch.io/monolith-ost

SPRITES & SOUND EFFECTS: GothicVania Assets by ansimuz

https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-patreon-collection

https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-church-pack

CODE SNIPPET: Camera Shake by Vivek Tank
